wblut.hemesh

Class HEM_Skew

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HEM_Modifier
      • wblut.hemesh.HEM_Skew
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HE_Machine

    public class HEM_Skew
extends HEM_Modifier
    Skew a mesh. Determined by a ground plane, a skew direction and a skew factor.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
